Member.summary: Asynchronously gets video meta-data using YouTube Data API v3.

Property.name: PageToken
Property.summary: The token to get the next set of videos in a play list.

Property.name: PlayListId
Property.summary: The play-list that is requested to get videos from.

Property.name: YoutubeService
Property.summary:
Credentials that is gotten from
AuthCredentials

Method.name: GetPlaylistItemListResponse
Method.summary: Asynchronously download 50 video meta-data at a time (because Google) as a play-list item list.
Method.returns: The meta-data for the 50 videos in the list.

Method.name: GetPlaylistItemLists
Method.summary: Asynchronously get all the play-list item list and put it as a list.

Method.name: GetVideoList
Method.summary:
Recursively download meta-data from a play-list using
GetPlaylistItemListResponse
.
Method.returns: A list of videos from a play-list.
